title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1271.34 - Right reserved to deny use of terminal for violation of rules and regulations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1271.34 - Right reserved to deny use of terminal for violation of rules and regulations

State Regulations

The airport operator shall have authority to deny the use
of the air terminal to any aircraft or pilot violating the rules and
regulations set forth in this Article or Federal regulations. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1271.34

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
